verses.name: Isaiah 57:5
verses.text: Enflaming yourselves with idols under every green tree, slaying the children in the valleys under the clifts of the rocks?

verses.name: Isaiah 57:6
verses.text: Among the smooth stones of the stream is thy portion; they, they are thy lot: even to them hast thou poured a drink offering, thou hast offered a meat offering. Should I receive comfort in these?

verses.name: Isaiah 57:7
verses.text: Upon a lofty and high mountain hast thou set thy bed: even thither wentest thou up to offer sacrifice.
